metadata.title: CVE-2015-5264 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The lesson module in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.10, 2.8.xbefore 2.8.8, and 2.9.x before 2.9.2 allows remote authenticated users tobypass intended access restrictions and enter additional answer attempts byleveraging the student role.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
